description: This men’s Merino wool shirt is bringing the style. Its slim cut and back-to-front side seams offer a body-enhancing fit, while its eco-conscious plant-based dye creates an intriguing and one-of-a-kind look. But that’s not all—this tee also brings ZQ-certified Merino wool softness, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. When you want to look good and feel good too, our Men's Merino Plant-Based Dye Short Sleeve Tee is a wardrobe must-have.
name: Smartwool Merino Plant-Based Dye SS Tee - Mens
